channel.title: Someone tried to Hack my account
channel.description: Hey, Can someone look into this? My account got hacked for a little bit, like a month or so until I just recently got it backed. Was the hash codes accidentally released or something? They just tried it again but this time I got like five emails saying my password was attempting to be redone or whatever on moparscape. Wtf? So anyways, I just wanted to see if you tracked the I.P. of users trying to reset passwords. Also, Whatup?

item.title: Someone tried to Hack my account
item.dc:creator: @Tico135 Tico
item.description:
@Tico135 wrote:

I tracked the IP, and I didn’t see any others then your current one.

I would additionally ask that you PM a GMod like myself or an administrator if you have further question regarding the situation, as these types of topics aren’t meant to be posted.

Read full topic
item.source: Someone tried to Hack my account

item.title: Someone tried to Hack my account
